because...

comfortable enough to know

be right before you're about
to go on a roller coaster

or even something
bad's about to happen, but...

From day one since I met her,
I've literally poured

everything I got into her,
and she's going to throw all that out

over some dude for a day
or however many times.
Like, no, I hope that doesn't happen.

-Are you, like, a little bit excited?
-I'm, like, freaking out.

I also am, like, why did he pick me?
But...

-Because you're hot.
-Is that like a real question?

I feel like the day we had was so good,
that if she had a bomb-ass date,

I don't... I still have the advantage.
We're still in bed together.

-We... I have plenty of time.
-It's the first time tonight.

And I think you know
what's going to happen.

I think that's real, too,
because you all just freshly got...

[Carrington] She's very excited
to be with me.

But I think it's kind of also,
she's going to be scared

to even come back
and talk with me about it.

It's just going to be a little awkward,
I think.
I'm not happy.

It's our first night as a couple,
I know Kierstan is so into me,

she's going to give him
a little bit of time.
but probably shoo him off pretty soon.

-Get to dream!
-Holy crap!

[Kierstan] Carrington,
get your ass over here.

-[Moira] Don't be nervous.
-[James] Don't be nervous?

-I'm a little nervous.
-Nuh-uh.

He's going to be our best
friend in the villa.
He can take Kaitlynn's spot.
We're sleeping together tonight so...

-Mmm.
-...it's going to be fun.

-Yeah, have fun.
-[kiss] Have fun.
Oh, I'm nervous! I have...

-What if we're doing something crazy?
-I know.

Or maybe we're just even
sitting down and having a chat.

But, I mean, it's Vegas.
Anything can happen.
[both] Bring on the boys!

I'm Caleb, I'm 24 years old,
originally from Oklahoma City.

With all confidence,
I really feel like I'm the full package.
I'm fun, I'm playful.
I have this geeky side.
But I look good, too.

I'm Calvin, I'm 25 years old.
I'm from Houston, Texas,

and I just left my job
as a bug spray salesman.

So I rate myself like a nine
or ten out of ten.

Got the looks, the abs,
I've got the smile.
I've got the personality.

If you're coming my way,
you better be hungry,
because I'm a full six-course meal, baby.

[Matthew] Move over, Paris.
Vegas is the new romance capital,

p.span: if they can charm Moira and Kiersten

div.p:
over white wine and a "charcahoot"...
charcuterie board. [sighs]

-I'm Caleb.
-I'm Kierstan.

-But you already knew that.
-Yea, for sure.
Oh my God, this is crazy.

I did not expect to be on
another date already.

-I've seen you on TV.
-Cringe.

You're killing it. You're beautiful.
Are you excited?

I'm excited to be here.
I'm glad that you picked me.

-Uh, you're definitely, I'm telling you...
-I'm more than excited here right now.

...you're definitely shaking things up.
Real quick, I'll tell you what's happened.
Tonight was a recoupling.

-So Carrington...
-[stammers] We're not even...

Oh my God, you don't even want to know?
It doesn't matter. [laughs]

-Oh my God.
-It's already in the past.
We're tonight now. We're looking forward.

-Okay, I love the confidence.
-We're looking forward, it's in the past.
Oh, my God! I need a drink after that.

-Yeah, I do too, honestly.
-Wow, I love the confidence.
Oh, my God, you got me a little hot.

-Where are you from?
-I'm from Houston, Texas.

-Okay.
-So Houston, yeah,

I'm living currently in Utah
at the moment,

-so, like, a mid-area there, but...
-Uh-huh.

-Okay.
-How about yourself?

-I'm 28.
-Okay, I...

-Have you ever dated older?
-I have, actually.

-I was like, I need to age like you.
-Really?

Oh my goodness. Like fine wine.
Oh, my goodness.

You're not that old. You know,
I've dated older and it's...
That's funny. I'm sorry. [laughs]

I am very, very, very,
very happy with him.
But this is "Love Island,"
and you have to keep your options open.
I'm about to step on some toes.

-for sure.
-Yeah, you are. Yeah, you are.

Oh, my God. Like,
they are losing their minds right now.

-Oh...
-I don't even care, honestly. [chuckles]

-[chuckles] You are very...
-[Caleb] No, I want to be cool.

No, I like it. I know, I'm just saying,
I'm the same.

Like, you know, you're going to,
like, kill it. Everyone's...

We're going to kill it.
I know you got it, yeah, yeah.

-Oh, okay.
-That's where I'm coming from.

I should be more uncomfortable because

-than you have known yours, so...
-Yeah.

Honestly, man,
I think Moira is way into you.
I still don't know.

So if it comes down between me

And I kind of show a little bit more,
but... it should be all right.

But I've known mine for less.
And I'm pretty comfortable.

-So, Moira.
-Yes.

What's the situation looking
like with James at the moment?

like, our heads won't turn

I am not good at this.
Because you are so cute.

And, you know, all I want
to do is be honest with myself.

And I would love
to get to know you better.

Like, I'll just have my eye,
like, slightly on you.
Hey, there are so many girls in the villa.

But I... I did choose you as one
of those ladies.

-I really, honestly...
-If that connection

-was stronger, in your opinion...
-A hundred percent.
...is that something you would be open to?
Yes, it would be something I'd be open to.

-Ah, love triangles. [sighs]
-Hey...

Cut out the middleman.
I mean, I'm just saying,

-I would love to get to know you further.
-[gasps]

-You have a big personality.
-Uh-huh.
And you need a grown man.

-Like, there with...
-To handle it? Yeah.

-Yeah.
-I did say that he doesn't have
anything to worry about.
But I am very invested in that.

I don't even want to...
Honestly, I respect that.

-But I...
-I don't want to talk about that.

-Oh, my God, okay, okay.
-We have plenty of time to chat.
I just got a text.

I'm hoping that it says you have
another hour to spend on your date.

-Oh, all right.
-[ding]

-What?
-I got a text.

-All right.
-What does it say?

but your night is not."

You can date another girl of your choice.

I got a text!
